nodes.text: Alee Aroval was a data forger. He wandered from system to system in the Outer Rim. He rarely stayed in the same port for more than a month. He acquired a stolen BoSS Interface plug, allowing him to make near-perfect alterations to spacers' permit datapads. Some said he used to work for the Hutts and rumor had it he swindled an important Hutt Clan Chief out of a millions Credits before he fled.
